content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: ETCD
      operator: longer_than
      value: 8
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.24
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: The length of ETCD should be no greater than 8
Outcome:
  Message: ETCD value is greater than 8
  Output Variables:
    - ETCD
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '24'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: ETCD (the companion to ELEMENT), SETCD (the short
                  name of a specific Trial Set), and TSPARMCD (the companion to TSPARM)
                  are limited to 8 characters
                Document: IG v3.1
                Item: Specification
                Section: 4.2.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TA
      - TE
      - SE

json.Description: The length of ETCD should be no greater than 8

Citations.Cited_Guidance: ETCD (the companion to ELEMENT), SETCD (the short name of a specific Trial Set), and TSPARMCD (the companion to TSPARM) are limited to 8 characters
